answers.answer: I would call and let your doctor know. I believe its preclampsia that can cause that. My midwife told me if it ever happens to let her know asap
I did I'm at the Dr now still waiting..
I had that and I had preeclampsia both times but don't worry it's ur bp is probably high and that's y ur head hurts too. They'll put u on bp meds and monitor u a little closer
I had that with both my older kids it probably your BP call your doc so they can figure out if you need a med or BP med or both take it seriously!
What did the doctor say? I hope everything was okay.

question: I'm 30w and just started seeing little white spots in my eyes. Like floating my head hurts a little.. anyone have and idea what causes this?!?
title: white spots?!?!
